#include<stdio.h>
#define size 10000
int minimum(int a,int b);
int main()
{
    int p[size],m[size],w[size],c[size],temp,r,fm[size],fw[size],fc[size],t,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
    scanf("%d%d%d%d",&p[i],&m[i],&w[i],&c[i]);
    i=0;
    while(i<t)
    {
        
        r=p[i];
        temp=(r*4)/5;
        fc[i]=minimum(temp,c[i]);
        fm[i]=m[i];
        fw[i]=minimum(fm[i]*2,w[i]);
        temp=(fm[i]+fw[i])*4;
        fc[i]=minimum(fc[i],temp);
        r=r-fc[i];
        temp=(r*2)/3;
        fw[i]=minimum(w[i],temp);
        fw[i]=minimum(fw[i],m[i]*2);
        r=r-fw[i];
        fm[i]=minimum(r,m[i]);
        i++;
    }
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
    printf("%d %d %d\n",fm[i],fw[i],fc[i]);
}  
int minimum(int a,int b)
{
    if(a<b)
    return a;
    else
    return b;
}
